name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Algorithms Engineer with 10+ years of experience delivering high-performance software solutions, specializing in **machine learning**, **Java**, **CI/CD**, and cloud platforms such as **AWS** and **Azure**. Proficient in programming languages including **JavaScript**, **Python**, **C#**, **Go**, and **PHP**, with a solid understanding of **static analysis** and **dynamic analysis**. Skilled in developing **LLMs** and implementing **prompt engineering** strategies to enhance AI capabilities in software applications.

Hands-on expertise includes building and deploying intelligent systems, with a focus on **GenAI** and creating robust algorithms that leverage real-time analytics for automation and decision-making. Experienced in building and leading the development of scalable architectures, including microservices and event-driven systems. Committed to creating solutions that not only meet industry compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS but also drive impactful results in healthcare and finance.
